channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiADC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiADC

item.title: CVE-2019-6699|2024-08-04T20:31:03.716Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiadc
item.description: An improper neutralization of input vulnerability in Fortinet FortiADC 5.3.3 and earlier may allow an attacker to execute a stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) via a field in the traffic group interface.

item.title: CVE-2020-15935|2024-08-04T13:30:23.222Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiadc
item.description: A cleartext storage of sensitive information in GUI in FortiADC versions 5.4.3 and below, 6.0.0 and below may allow a remote authenticated attacker to retrieve some sensitive information such as users LDAP passwords and RADIUS shared secret by deobfuscating the passwords entry fields.
